docs.title: Welcome to Sandboxbio hosted by IFB documentation
Installation tutorial
docs.text:
Requirement

Node.js and npm are required. Please install them before this tutorial.

For local installationFor server install with nginx

docs.title: Fork, clone or download this project
Install all required packages for Sandbox.bio
docs.text:
step 1

cd sandbox.bio
npm install
step 2

cd app
npm install

docs.title: Build the sandbox.bio app
docs.text:
npm run build
npm run dev
If everything went well you see a message like this below.

Your application is ready~! 🚀

  - Local:      http://0.0.0.0:1111
  - Network:    http://xx.xxx.xx.xx:1111

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text:
Text can be deleted and replacement text added. This can also be combined into onea single operation. Highlighting is also possible and comments can be added inline.

Formatting can also be applied to blocks by putting the opening and closing tags on separate lines and adding new lines between the tags and the content.
